data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kWg1BvueG_YQ7kNvgGYG7_e&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AqwUXya0PXJGYZiCQgIMgnr&oh=00_AYBujUNlHoW9VAXi-BWfxG-8FauuuclaHDtzEzKJHeCigQ&oe=66EACD8C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bVsIZsZBShQQ7kNvgE4i0X3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AqwUXya0PXJGYZiCQgIMgnr&oh=00_AYA9hxKuUdUPlQirjaOSQthgoBegafkYhgGrhBWTXD_-8w&oe=66EACB9F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
